snippet: Gregor Schlierenzauer broke the record for career World Cup ski jumping victories with his 47th, in a morning competition in Harrachov, Czech Republic.
abstract: Austrian skier Gregor Schlierenzauer claims record 47th World Cup ski jump victory in Harrachov, Czech Republic; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Gregor Schlierenzauer broke the record for career World Cup ski jumping victories with his 47th, in a morning competition in Harrachov, Czech Republic.

headline.main: World Cup Ski Jump Record Broken
